#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define forall(i,a,b)               for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define pb                          push_back
#define mp 							make_pair
#define INDEX(arr,ind)               (lower_bound(all(arr),ind)-arr.begin())
#define mod                          1000000007

#define TRvi(c, it) \
for (vi::iterator it = (c).begin(); it != (c).end(); it++)
#define TRvii(c, it) \
for (vii::iterator it = (c).begin(); it != (c).end(); it++)
#define TRmsi(c, it) \
for (msi::iterator it = (c).begin(); it != (c).end(); it++)

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int, int> ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
typedef set<int> si;
typedef map <string, int> msi;



int main()
{
	 #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
     freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
     #endif
	 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);

	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,m,k;
		cin>>n>>m>>k;
		int a[n][m+1];
		ll count=0,rcount=0;
		char ch;
		forall(i,0,n-1)
		{
			rcount=0;
			forall(j,0,m-1)
			{
				cin>>ch;
				if (ch=='.')
				{
					a[i][j]=0;
				}
				else
				{
					a[i][j]=1;count++;rcount++;
				}
			}
			a[i][m]=rcount;
		}
		
		while(k--)
		{
			ll mn=100000000,idx=0;
			forall(i,0,n-1)
			{
				if(mn>a[i][m])
				{
					mn=a[i][m];
					idx=i;
				}
			}
			rcount=0;
			forall(i,0,m-1)
			{
				if(a[idx][i]==0)
				{
					a[idx][i]=1;
					rcount++;
				}
				else
				a[idx][i]=0;
				
			}
			count+=(rcount-a[idx][m]);
			a[idx][m]=rcount;
		}
		/*forall(i,0,n-1)
		{
			forall(j,0,m)
			cout<<a[i][j]<<" ";
			cout<<endl;
		}*/
		cout<<count<<endl;



	}
	return 0;
}
